start.text: All right all right all right...

out_of_missiles.text: Aw, and I was just gettin' warmed up!

engaged.text: These boys really know how to dance!

need_help.text: Could use a hand over here!
Don't just stand there, do somethin'!

pursuing.text: Woo! Are you having fun yet? I am!

hull_90.text: I'm doin' fine, worry about the other guys!

hull_50.text: These guys sure are spoilin' for a fight!
Well, this sure could be goin' better...

hull_30.text: Boy, I think they woke up pissed!

overload.text: Woo! The best gunfights happen on the frontier!

victory.text: And that's how you do it!
